price: Basi nawamuabudu Mola Mlezi wa Nyumba hii,
footnotes: Basi wamtakasie ibada Mola Mlezi wa Nyumba hii aliye wawezesha kuzifanya hizi safari mbili.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
